pages.title: Velociraptor
pages.text: Scientific name: Velociraptor antirrhopus (Deinonychus)$(br2)Period: Late Cretaceous$(br2)Diet: Carn√≠vore$(br2)Behaviour: Sociable, Aggressive$(br2)Preferred Biome: Deserts and Plains
Velociraptors are often seen in packs. They are highly intelligent, capable of setting traps and communicating with others.
